dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.balanceTooltip: Monthly balance considering transfers to/from reserve accounts. Transferring to reserve reduces available balance.
dashboard.monthBalanceTooltip: Net result of this month's transactions only: Realized Income ‚àí Realized Expenses.
dashboard.accumulatedBalanceTooltip: Total money available in all accounts today (Banks + Wallet + Reserves).
dashboard.availableBalanceTooltip: Operational cash: balance of all accounts EXCEPT Reserves/Savings. What you have to spend today without touching reserves.
dashboard.totalAssetsTooltip: Total family liquidity: sum of all bank accounts, wallets, and savings.
dashboard.closingForecastTooltip: Projection: Available Balance + Pending Income ‚àí Pending Expenses until month's end. Does NOT include reserves.
dashboard.reservesTooltip: Amounts saved in accounts marked as 'Savings'. Not counted in Available Balance.
dashboard.projectedBalanceTooltip: How much you'll have at month's end if all pending income/expenses are received/paid.
dashboard.toPayTooltip: Only planned expenses. Reduces when payment is confirmed.
dashboard.forecastTooltip: Balance projection for the month considering pending income and expenses.
dashboard.forecastBalanceTooltip: Balance projection for the month considering pending items.
dashboard.totalBalanceTooltip: Current consolidated balance considering all confirmed transactions, regardless of month.
